comment._content:
W0W.    

Down the street is the Plaza...the "Entirely New, Ultra Modern, Air Conditioned, Luxurious Seating, Perfect Sound...etc etc. that replaced the Maple Leaf almost a year earlier.   

Only ~25 years old, the Globe was...  replaced by the Paradise in November '38 ... New English Seating!   Modern Mirrorphonic Sound.

And about 25 years later.....http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=qpVlAAAAIBAJ&sjid=TooNAAAAIBAJ&pg=2311%2C1833656
